Summary: 5 dim lights forming triangular shape passed over back yard at high velocity
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Cambridge
There were no other sightings in Cambridge on or around September 1st 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting in the backyard having a smoke sometime close to midnight when i saw 5 dim lights which formed the outline of a v or triangle pass directly overhead, possible 50-100 metres above. lights travelled at a high rate of speed in a straight line, maybe 100-200 km\hour. was visible for only maybe 5 seconds or more before "object" vanished from sight. i was observing the stars so was looking in a generally upward direction at that moment. at first i thought perhaps the 5 lights were birds flying in formation but after a quick second i realized that: a) there was absolutely no sound emanating from the "object". b) velocity was far too rapid for birds. c) birds don't fly at night (do they. my reaction was fairly calm. i found the event to be fascinating but no cause for alarm.
